hero.title: Find Your Dream Car at the Best Price
hero.subtitle: Browse thousands of listings from verified sellers across the country.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: At AutoSog, we're dedicated to creating a transparent and efficient marketplace for buying and selling vehicles. Our platform connects car sellers with potential buyers, making the process simple, secure, and enjoyable for everyone involved.

trusted.title: Trusted Platform
trusted.description: We verify all sellers and provide detailed information about each listing to ensure a safe experience.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Our intuitive interface makes it simple to browse listings or create your own in just minutes.

wideSelection.title: Wide Selection
wideSelection.description: Browse thousands of vehicles from private sellers and dealers across the country.

communityFocused.title: Community Focused
communityFocused.description: We're building more than a marketplace—we're creating a community of car enthusiasts and everyday drivers.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: Founded in 2023, AutoSog was born from a simple idea: car buying and selling should be straightforward and transparent. What started as a small project has grown into a platform trusted by thousands of users nationwide. We're continuously improving our services based on user feedback to provide the best experience possible.

joinUs.title: Join Our Community
joinUs.description: Whether you're looking to sell your current vehicle or find your next dream car, AutoSog is here to help. Join thousands of satisfied users and experience a better way to buy and sell cars.

wideSelection.title: Wide Selection
wideSelection.description: Thousands of verified car listings with detailed information and high-quality photos.

directContact.title: Direct Contact
directContact.description: Connect directly with sellers – no intermediaries or commission fees.

timeSaving.title: Time Saving
timeSaving.description: Advanced filters and search tools help you find exactly what you're looking for quickly.

trustedPlatform.title: Trusted Platform
trustedPlatform.description: Verified sellers and detailed listing moderation for a secure experience.

cta.title: Ready to Sell Your Car?
cta.subtitle: List your car on our platform and reach thousands of potential buyers.

createListing.pageSubtitle: Complete the form below to list your car for sale. The more details you provide, the better chance you'll have of selling quickly.

basics.title: Basic Details
basics.description: Enter the basic information about your vehicle
basics.titlePlaceholder: e.g. 2020 Toyota Camry in Excellent Condition
basics.titleDescription: Create a catchy title that highlights the key features of your car.

pricing.title: Pricing & Condition
pricing.description: Provide details about the car's condition and pricing
pricing.conditionDescription: Select the condition that best describes your car.

vehicle.title: Vehicle Specifications
vehicle.description: Specify the technical details of your vehicle

description.title: Description
description.description: Provide a detailed description of your vehicle
description.placeholder: Describe your car in detail. Include information about its condition, history, special features, and why you are selling it.
description.advice: Be honest and thorough. The more details you provide, the better.

features.title: Features
features.description: Select the features that your vehicle has

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: How can potential buyers reach you?
contact.name: Name

submit.notice: Your listing will be reviewed before being published

footer.description: The premier marketplace for buying and selling cars. Find your perfect vehicle or sell your car quickly and easily.

admin.enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to access the admin dashboard
